Performance depends on the mission environment. The game suggests mosly high and medium settings and for the most time it is playable. However in huge open reas, especially at night, the CPU struggles. 
Turned it all down to low now and the game still looks great and is playable at 20-30 fps. If you google a little you might find some tweaks for better performance.

IF your specs are beneath this you shouldn't even bother the download. The game will probably not run well. Multiplayer is gonna work better than singleplayer, but I think that eye-candy is kind a important in this game :)

ok for people that want to know how to bypass origin and how to install english and so on just listen up I'll explain.

First step, You need to download This torrent ;) Next step download the English language torrent (just search battlefield 3 in the search bar) 

once downloaded mount the ISO using daemon tools or some other mounting software? you decide. 
A pop up should appear on screen (autorun) 
before you click autorun disable origin, right click on the task bar on origin and click Exit
 Then Just click Autorun and let it set up and install. shouldn't take any longer than 10 mins.
(this is what I done to get mine to work.) 
once installed run the game it will be in Russian Don't worry though. just bring up task manger and end task BF3.exe
go the dictionary where BF3 was installed. (C:\Program Files (x86)\Battlefield 3) now locate the folder /Loc (C:\Program Files (x86)\Battlefield 3\Data\Win32\Loc)
simple unrar the language files you torrented and drag n drop them in the LOC folder next to the RU language file's

and that's it done, all you need to do is set the language to English, http://www.cjs-cdkeys.com/battlefield-3-origin/reg.rar do this and it's done :) now you'll be ready to kick some AI arse, Well shoot em whatever ha.
For some reason I've got mine set to Low n it don't stutter, any higher and it does. Time for a new GPU and PSU I think :D :L Head over to my youtube channel, /mrpurpleraver

Edit:.... 
In the Loc folder their should be to file's ru.sb and ru.toc leave them there dont touch them simply drag n drop the en.sb and the en.toc files into that folder then follow what I said to get the language to English in game :) have funn :D

Worked for me 100% on (win 7 32bit , nvidia 9500 GT 1 Giga , 2 Giga RAM and CPU 3 GH Dual Core )


Battlefield 3 Double Sound Echo Fix By Dr Ali Aliraqi


Before you begin and load your mission (on Game Menu)

Press Alt + Tab then Task Manager then rigth click on BF3.exe then Set Affinity

after that unselect CPU 1 ( Select only CPU 0 )

you will notice that  double sound or sound echo disapear ...

But you will notice also that game will become slower (because only one CPU of dual core CPU worked) so you needed to reduce resolution ...


Note :Few Seconds after loading and beginning your mission you can reselect CPU 1 with CPU 0 and game will become faster ...

But But But double sound or echo reapear when new loading regain (loading regain when you kill or begin next mission etc ... ) ...


So Conclusion : Dual Core CPU is main cause of double sound or echo ...


So we are waiting  computer supporter that make patch or installer or anything for : ( battlefield 3 begin with single core CPU and converted to dual core 
CPU automatically few seconds after loading complete and when new loading reapear it converted to single core CPU automatically and it converted to dual core
CPU automatically few seconds after loading complete )   

It is so difficult but we are needing that ...
